value.title: Deploy a website to Azure with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Web apps in Azure allow you to publish and manage your website easily without having to work with the underlying servers, storage, or network assets. Instead, you can focus on your website features and rely on the robust Azure platform to provide secure access to your site.

topItems.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
topItems.excerpt: Set up your local development environment with several popular IDEs.

images.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Azure App Service enables you to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. Learn how to create a website through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

images.title: Host a web application with Azure App service

topItems.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
topItems.excerpt: Use the publishing features of Visual Studio 2017 to deploy and manage an ASP.NET Core web application hosted on Azure.

images.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
topItems.excerpt: Use deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

images.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
Prepare your development environment for Azure development

value.title: Architect secure infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

topItems.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

topItems.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Your application requires service passwords, connection strings, and other secret configuration values to do its job. Storing and handling secret values is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of leakage. Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

images.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

images.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor resources by using Azure Monitor and implement backup and recover in Azure. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate monitoring options for an Azure virtual machine (VM). Enable diagnostics to get data about your VM. View VM metrics and create an alert to monitor performance.

images.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

value.title: Monitor and back up resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor resources by using Azure Monitor and implement backup and recover in Azure.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate monitoring options for an Azure virtual machine (VM). Enable diagnostics to get data about your VM. View VM metrics and create an alert to monitor performance.

images.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

value.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Azure Functions allow developers to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning infrastructure.

images.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions

value.title: AZ-400: Define and implement continuous integration
value.excerpt:
Create automated pipelines that continuously build, test, package, and deploy your applications.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

images.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up automated testing in your pipeline to improve code quality.

images.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
topItems.excerpt: Manage your application and the packages it uses across build pipelines.

images.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts

topItems.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use your own build agent when Microsoft-hosted agents don't meet your needs.

images.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: In this module, we discuss how to create a Linux virtual machine using the Azure portal.

images.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

images.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes

value.title: AI edge engineer
value.excerpt: The AI edge engineer learning path takes an engineering-led approach for the deployment of AI to edge devices within the framework of the cloud. This learning path helps the participants to learn skills in AI (broadly covering machine learning and deep learning algorithms), IoT and DevOps.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
topItems.excerpt: Explain the significance of Azure IoT and the problems it solves. Describe Azure IoT components and explain how you combine them to solve IoT solutions, which create value for enterprises.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
topItems.excerpt: Assess the characteristics of Azure IoT Hub and determine scenarios when to use IoT Hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
topItems.excerpt: Explain the essential characteristics of the IoT Edge and the functionality of the IoT Edge components (modules, runtime, and cloud interface). Characterize the types of problems that you can solve with IoT Edge.  Describe how the elements of IoT Edge can be combined to solve the problem of deploying IoT applications in the cloud.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

topItems.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
topItems.excerpt: Deploy a pre-built temperature simulator module to the edge using a container. The pre-built module will be deployed to an IoT edge device. You will check that the module was successfully created and deployed to the edge. You will view the simulated data from the deployed module.

images.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
Introduction to Azure IoT

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

images.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
Design your migration to Azure

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
Design your migration to Azure

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: Explore how the world of data has evolved and how the advent of cloud technologies is providing new opportunities for business to explore. You will learn the various data platform technologies that are available, and how a Data Engineer can take advantage of this technology to an organization benefit.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: ExposeÂ multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Combine multiple Azure Functions apps into a unified interface by importing them into a single Azure API Management instance.

images.title: ExposeÂ multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Create a Docker image and store it in a repository in Azure Container Registry. Use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the Docker image. Configure continuous deployment for the web app by using a webhook that monitors the Docker image for changes.

images.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service

value.title: Deploy and configure Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine
value.excerpt: In this learning path, youâ€™ll learn how to deploy and configure Azure IaaS Virtual Machine workloads. After completing the learning path, youâ€™ll know how to plan, deploy, and upgrade Windows Server Azure Virtual Machines.

topItems.title: Plan and deploy Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to describe Azure compute and storage in relation to Azure VMs, and deploy Azure VMs by using the Azure portal, Azure CLI, or templates.

topItems.title: Customize Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine images
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to create new VMs from generalized images and use Azure Image Builder templates to create and manage images in Azure.

topItems.title: Automate the configuration of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to deploy Desired State Configuration (DSC) extensions, implement those extensions to remediate noncompliant servers, and use custom script extension.

topItems.title: Upgrade and migrate Windows Server IaaS virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn to migrate a workload running in Windows Server to an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) virtual machine (VM) and to Windows Server 2019 by using Windows Server migration tools or the Storage Migration Service.

value.title: Implement a Windows Server hybrid cloud infrastructure
value.excerpt: You will learn how to address problems relating to the migration of on-premises workloads into Azure. After completing the learning path, you will be able to implement a hybrid Azure infrastructure.

topItems.title: Implement hybrid network infrastructure
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn to connect your on-premises environment to Azure, implement subnets and routing between your on-premises and cloud environments, and ensure that workloads in the cloud and on-premises perform DNS resolution to locate each other.

topItems.title: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server
topItems.excerpt: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server

topItems.title: Migrate on-premises Windows Server instances to Azure IaaS virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to plan a migration and select appropriate server migration tools. You will also learn how to use Azure Migrate, how to assess physical servers, and how to migrate those servers.

topItems.title: Implement a hybrid file server infrastructure
topItems.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll learn to deploy Azure File Sync, migrate from DFS, and use Storage Migration Services to migrate file servers to Azure.

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Security
value.excerpt: This learning path deals with securing your Azure resources. After completing the learning path, youâ€™ll be able to determine if your Azure IaaS workloads have any security vulnerabilities, and remediate those potential security vulnerabilities.

topItems.title: Audit the security of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn about Azure Security Center and how to onboard Windows Server computers to Security Center. You'll also learn about Azure Sentinel, security information and event management (SIEM), and security orchestration, automation and response (SOAR).

topItems.title: Manage Azure updates
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to enable Azure Update Management, deploy updates, review an update assessment, and manage updates for your Azure VMs.

topItems.title: Create and implement application allowlists with adaptive application control
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Adaptive application controls within your organization to protect your Windows Server IaaS VMs.

topItems.title: Configure BitLocker disk encryption for Windows IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to configure Azure Disk Encryption for Windows IaaS VMs and back up and recover encrypted data.

value.title: Migrate virtual machines and apps using Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: The Virtual machine and app migration using Azure Migrate learning path gives you a step-by-step process to help you understand, set up, assess, and migrate virtual and physical servers, databases, applications, and virtual desktops from on-premises to the Azure infrastructure. Azure Migrate now includes fully integrated and optimized migration-specific tools previously available only in Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Azure Migrate helps you realize the benefits of moving your on-premises VMware or Hyper-V server workloads to Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS). Learn the process for migrating your workload agent-less, all within the hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

topItems.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to check your prerequisite configurations in Azure and in your VMware vSphere environment and then perform the initial steps in Azure Migrate to choose your assessment and migration tools.

images.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration

topItems.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Explore the Azure Migrate tools for discovering and assessing your virtual machine servers. Learn how to install and configure a virtual machine appliance in your virtualization host infrastructure.

images.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate

topItems.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Learn the process for replicating, testing, and finally migrating your virtual machines into production.

images.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

value.title: Monitor and maintain Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine
value.excerpt: In this learning path, youâ€™ll learn how to implement remote administration and management in Azure. After completing this path, youâ€™ll be able to monitor your Azure resources, and plan for scale and high-availability.

topItems.title: Administer and manage Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine remotely
topItems.excerpt: Youâ€™ll be able to select and use suitable tools and techniques to remotely manage Windows IaaS VMs, and restrict administrative connections to those VMs.

topItems.title: Monitor Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines and hybrid instances
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Azure Monitor for IaaS Virtual Machines in Azure, implement Azure Monitor in on-premises environments, and use dependency maps.

topItems.title: Understand Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine cost management
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to use the Pricing calculator to assess likely costs, use Azure Advisor to monitor actual costs for Azure resources, implement Spot VMs and Azure Reservations, and describe benefits of Azure Hybrid licensing.

topItems.title: Implement scale and high availability with Windows Server VM
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn how to implement scaling for virtual machine scale sets and load-balanced VMs. You'll also learn how to implement Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Understand and create the different types of disk storage available to Azure virtual machines (VMs).

images.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: A trigger is responsible for executing an Azure function and there are dozens of triggers to choose from. This module will you show you some of the most common types of triggers and how to configure them to execute your logic.

images.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

images.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using Durable Functions.

images.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

images.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets

value.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

images.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Webhooks offer a lightweight mechanism for your app to be notified by another service when something of interest happens. In this module. you'll learn how to trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

images.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
